3459.quote: Gratitude unlocks the fullness of life. It turns what we have into enough, and more. It turns denial into acceptance, chaos to order, confusion to clarity. It can turn a meal into a feast, a house into a home, a stranger into a friend.
3459.author: Melody Beattie

3460.quote: Be thankful for what you have; you'll end up having more. If you concentrate on what you don't have, you will never, ever have enough.
3460.author: Oprah Winfrey

3461.quote: Gratitude makes sense of our past, brings peace for today, and creates a vision for tomorrow.
3461.author: Melody Beattie

3462.quote: If the only prayer you ever say in your entire life is thank you, it will be enough.
3462.author: Meister Eckhart

3463.quote: When you rise in the morning, give thanks for the light, for your life, for your strength. Give thanks for your food and for the joy of living. If you see no reason to give thanks, the fault lies in yourself.
3463.author: Tecumseh

3464.quote: Be true to yourself, help others, make each day your masterpiece, make friendship a fine art, drink deeply from good books - especially the Bible, build a shelter against a rainy day, give thanks for your blessings and pray for guidance every day.
3464.author: John Wooden

3465.quote: At times our own light goes out and is rekindled by a spark from another person. Each of us has cause to think with deep gratitude of those who have lighted the flame within us.
3465.author: Albert Schweitzer

3466.quote: Feeling gratitude and not expressing it is like wrapping a present and not giving it.
3466.author: William Arthur Ward

3467.quote: Many times, the decisions we make affect and hurt your closest friends and family the most. I have a lot of regrets in that regard. But God has forgiven me, which I am very thankful for. It has enabled me to forgive myself and move forward one day at a time.
3467.author: Lex Luger

3468.quote: Make it a habit to tell people thank you. To express your appreciation, sincerely and without the expectation of anything in return. Truly appreciate those around you, and you'll soon find many others around you. Truly appreciate life, and you'll find that you have more of it.
3468.author: Ralph Marston

3469.quote: If you are really thankful, what do you do? You share.
3469.author: W. Clement Stone

3470.quote: In everyone's life, at some time, our inner fire goes out. It is then burst into flame by an encounter with another human being. We should all be thankful for those people who rekindle the inner spirit.
3470.author: Albert Schweitzer

3471.quote: I was given such a great gift. It's a miracle that never stops amazing me and reminding me to give thanks, every day. Having a wife and daughter gives me a lot more purpose. I was much more selfish before, but now I think about what kind of role model I'll be. I just want to be a better man.
3471.author: Jake Owen

3473.quote: I'm just thankful for everything, all the blessings in my life, trying to stay that way. I think that's the best way to start your day and finish your day. It keeps everything in perspective.
3473.author: Tim Tebow

3474.quote: Whatever we are waiting for - peace of mind, contentment, grace, the inner awareness of simple abundance - it will surely come to us, but only when we are ready to receive it with an open and grateful heart.
3474.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

3475.quote: I write about the power of trying, because I want to be okay with failing. I write about generosity because I battle selfishness. I write about joy because I know sorrow. I write about faith because I almost lost mine, and I know what it is to be broken and in need of redemption. I write about gratitude because I am thankful - for all of it.
3475.author: Kristin Armstrong

3476.quote: Joy is the simplest form of gratitude.
3476.author: Karl Barth

3477.quote: When you practice gratefulness, there is a sense of respect toward others.
3477.author: Dalai Lama

3478.quote: I don't think you should spend your life praying for things, but I do believe you should thank God for what He's given you... but I think the scripture teaches us that we can pray for our dreams, pray for the big things... he's not a small God; this God is incredible.
3478.author: Joel Osteen

3479.quote: Gratitude is the sign of noble souls.
3479.author: Aesop

3480.quote: The thankful receiver bears a plentiful harvest.
3480.author: William Blake

3481.quote: 'Thank you' is the best prayer that anyone could say. I say that one a lot. Thank you expresses extreme gratitude, humility, understanding.
3481.author: Alice Walker

3482.quote: None of us got to where we are alone. Whether the assistance we received was obvious or subtle, acknowledging someone's help is a big part of understanding the importance of saying thank you.
3482.author: Harvey Mackay

3483.quote: I am thankful the most important key in history was invented. It's not the key to your house, your car, your boat, your safety deposit box, your bike lock or your private community. It's the key to order, sanity, and peace of mind. The key is 'Delete.'
3483.author: Elayne Boosler

3484.quote: Talent is God-given; be humble. Fame is man-given; be thankful. Conceit is self-given; be careful.
3484.author: Harvey Mackay

3485.quote: I'm thankful to God for having a family that's been there for me. He's been there from the time I was a child to even now with my family helping with my little boy. It's worth more than words could ever describe. That's one of the ways I've been able to stay grounded is thanks to family and God.
3485.author: Ashton Shepherd

3486.quote: All I ever wanted really, and continue to want out of life, is to give 100 percent to whatever I'm doing and to be committed to whatever I'm doing and then let the results speak for themselves. Also to never take myself or people for granted and always be thankful and grateful to the people who helped me.
3486.author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee

3487.quote: Thank you for life, and all the little ups and downs that make it worth living.
3487.author: Travis Barker

3488.quote: In this world of sin and sorrow there is always something to be thankful for; as for me, I rejoice that I am not a Republican.
3488.author: H. L. Mencken

3489.quote: I believe that if you don't derive a deep sense of purpose from what you do, if you don't come radiantly alive several times a day, if you don't feel deeply grateful at the tremendous good fortune that has been bestowed on you, then you are wasting your life. And life is too short to waste.
3489.author: Srikumar Rao

3490.quote: If a fellow isn't thankful for what he's got, he isn't likely to be thankful for what he's going to get.
3490.author: Frank A. Clark

3491.quote: Thanksgiving is a time when the world gets to see just how blessed and how workable the Christian system is. The emphasis is not on giving or buying, but on being thankful and expressing that appreciation to God and to one another.
3491.author: John Clayton

3492.quote: Some people are always grumbling because roses have thorns; I am thankful that thorns have roses.
3492.author: Alphonse Karr

3493.quote: Gratitude is not only the greatest of virtues, but the parent of all the others.
3493.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

3494.quote: Appreciation is the highest form of prayer, for it acknowledges the presence of good wherever you shine the light of your thankful thoughts.
3494.author: Alan Cohen

3495.quote: My advice: Take a second out of the day today and be thankful for your family.
3495.author: Jenna Morasca

3496.quote: When it comes to life the critical thing is whether you take things for granted or take them with gratitude.
3496.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

3497.quote: Gratitude bestows reverence, allowing us to encounter everyday epiphanies, those transcendent moments of awe that change forever how we experience life and the world.
3497.author: John Milton

3498.quote: Gratitude is the fairest blossom which springs from the soul.
3498.author: Henry Ward Beecher

3499.quote: I don't need a holiday or a feast to feel grateful for my children, the sun, the moon, the roof over my head, music, and laughter, but I like to take this time to take the path of thanks less traveled.
3499.author: Paula Poundstone

3500.quote: For what I have received may the Lord make me truly thankful. And more truly for what I have not received.
3500.author: Storm Jameson

3501.quote: Let us be grateful to the mirror for revealing to us our appearance only.
3501.author: Samuel Butler

3502.quote: Let me encourage you to get up every day and focus on what you do have in life. Be thankful for the blessings of the little things, even when you don't get what you expect.
3502.author: Victoria Osteen

3503.quote: It is just that we should be grateful, not only to those with whose views we may agree, but also to those who have expressed more superficial views; for these also contributed something, by developing before us the powers of thought.
3503.author: Aristotle

3504.quote: There's no happier person than a truly thankful, content person.
3504.author: Joyce Meyer

3505.quote: I know that when I pray, something wonderful happens. Not just to the person or persons for whom I'm praying, but also something wonderful happens to me. I'm grateful that I'm heard.
3505.author: Maya Angelou

3506.quote: Be grateful for what you have and stop complaining - it bores everybody else, does you no good, and doesn't solve any problems.
3506.author: Zig Ziglar

3507.quote: When you are grateful - when you can see what you have - you unlock blessings to flow in your life.
3507.author: Suze Orman

3508.quote: Every Thanksgiving, we all write down three things we're thankful for and put them in a hat. Then we pass the hat around the dinner table and everyone has to guess who wrote what!
3508.author: Debby Ryan

3509.quote: Often people ask how I manage to be happy despite having no arms and no legs. The quick answer is that I have a choice. I can be angry about not having limbs, or I can be thankful that I have a purpose. I chose gratitude.
3509.author: Nick Vujicic

3510.quote: Keep your eyes open to your mercies. The man who forgets to be thankful has fallen asleep in life.
3510.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

3511.quote: Gratitude is the most exquisite form of courtesy.
3511.author: Jacques Maritain

3512.quote: I have nothing to ask for, thanks to God. Everything I have, God has given me.
3512.author: Mariano Rivera

3513.quote: I'd like to say to all my fans out there, thanks for the support. And to all my doubters, thank you very much because you guys have also pushed me.
3513.author: Usain Bolt

3514.quote: I'm really thankful to God, man. Like now, I'm really making a real comeback with my group. With or without a record, with or without a movie. And behind all the negative press behind this movie.
3514.author: Ike Turner

3515.quote: We have to be thankful to the Czechs that they did their duty. The Czech Republic won, I can't believe it. It was a huge party with all the people here.
3515.author: Ruud van Nistelrooy

3516.quote: I'm thankful for the three ounce Ziploc bag, so that I have somewhere to put my savings.
3516.author: Paula Poundstone

3517.quote: I'm just very thankful. And I say that a lot because that's the most important message.
3517.author: Pharrell Williams

3518.quote: I think my mother is my biggest influence. There are so many things I hate about her but at the same time I'm thankful for her. All I know is that when I'm a parent I want to be just like my mom. I can talk to my mom more than any of my friends could talk to their parents.
3518.author: Nikki Reed

3519.quote: China has not established the rule of law and if there is a power above the law there is no social justice. Everybody can be subjected to harm. I'm just a citizen: my life is equal in value to any other. But I'm thankful that when I lost my freedom so many people shared feelings and put such touching effort into helping me.
3519.author: Ai Weiwei

3520.quote: I am definitely a Type A personality, always rushing around, trying to do too much, not good at just lying on the beach. But I'm so thankful for everything I have: wonderfully supportive parents and sisters, the best husband in the world, terrific students I love teaching and hanging out with, and above all, my two amazing daughters.
3520.author: Amy Chua

3521.quote: I did not break up the Beatles. You can't have it both ways. If you're going to blame me for breaking the Beatles up, you should be thankful that I made them into myth rather than a crumbling group.
3521.author: Yoko Ono

3522.quote: Being away from home was tough, but the challenge and the thrill of being on Broadway was so fulfilling, and I'm thankful to my husband for making it possible and holding it down at home.
3522.author: Nicole Ari Parker

3523.quote: As a husband, father and public servant, I'm thankful for the counsel and wisdom of my older brothers - Bill, who was a priest, and Kevin, who is a priest.
3523.author: Denis McDonough

3524.quote: Sometimes our light goes out but is blown into flame by another human being. Each of us owes deepest thanks to those who have rekindled this light.
3524.author: Albert Schweitzer

3525.quote: No one who achieves success does so without acknowledging the help of others. The wise and confident acknowledge this help with gratitude.
3525.author: Alfred North Whitehead

3526.quote: Immensely grateful, touched, proud, astonished, abashed.
3526.author: Boris Pasternak

3527.quote: Feeling gratitude isn't born in us - it's something we are taught, and in turn, we teach our children.
3527.author: Joyce Brothers

3528.quote: The hardest arithmetic to master is that which enables us to count our blessings.
3528.author: Eric Hoffer

3529.quote: Thank you, dear God, for this good life and forgive us if we do not love it enough. Thank you for the rain. And for the chance to wake up in three hours and go fishing: I thank you for that now, because I won't feel so thankful then.
3529.author: Garrison Keillor

3530.quote: Thankfulness is the beginning of gratitude. Gratitude is the completion of thankfulness. Thankfulness may consist merely of words. Gratitude is shown in acts.
3530.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

3531.quote: No duty is more urgent than that of returning thanks.
3531.author: James Allen

3532.quote: It is another's fault if he be ungrateful, but it is mine if I do not give. To find one thankful man, I will oblige a great many that are not so.
3532.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

3533.quote: Thanks to television, for the first time the young are seeing history made before it is censored by their elders.
3533.author: Margaret Mead

3534.quote: I work very hard, and I play very hard. I'm grateful for life. And I live it - I believe life loves the liver of it. I live it.
3534.author: Maya Angelou

3535.quote: I am thankful for laughter, except when milk comes out of my nose.
3535.author: Woody Allen

3536.quote: It's been quite a roller coaster ride, but I've grown and learned a lot about myself. The greatest thing is being able to interact with fans and touch people's lives... for that I give thanks.
3536.author: Christina Aguilera

3537.quote: Gratitude changes the pangs of memory into a tranquil joy.
3537.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

3538.quote: I am going to spend my time today just thanking the people that played a role in my career, because I truly do believe that I was blessed by a lot of people that paths crossed mine as I went down the road in my career.
3538.author: Nolan Ryan

3539.quote: God has two dwellings; one in heaven, and the other in a meek and thankful heart.
3539.author: Izaak Walton

3540.quote: Dear Lord, I'm so grateful I'm still loved.
3540.author: Vivien Leigh

3541.quote: Such lovely warmth of thought and delicacy of colour are beyond all praise, and equally beyond all thanks!
3541.author: Marie Corelli

3542.quote: The trick is to be grateful when your mood is high and graceful when it is low.
3542.author: Richard Carlson

3543.quote: I've been giving back since I was a teen, handing out turkeys at Thanksgiving and handing out toys at toys drives for Christmas. It's very important to give back as a youth. It's as simple as helping an old lady across the street or giving up your seat on the bus for someone who is pregnant.
3543.author: Queen Latifah

3544.quote: When I started counting my blessings, my whole life turned around.
3544.author: Willie Nelson

3545.quote: I wouldn't change anything. I've made mistakes, but thanks to those mistakes, I've learned.
3545.author: Enrique Iglesias

3546.quote: I am what I am, I'm doing very well in my life, and I'm thankful to God for that.
3546.author: LL Cool J

3547.quote: I'm thankful for serendipitous moments in my life, where things could've gone the other way.
3547.author: Rick Springfield

3548.quote: Of all the characteristics needed for both a happy and morally decent life, none surpasses gratitude. Grateful people are happier, and grateful people are more morally decent.
3548.author: Dennis Prager

3549.quote: I feel grateful because I have a lot of love in my life. I found the person I'm sharing my life with. I have a good man.
3549.author: Gisele Bundchen

3550.quote: I was successful materially, but I know life is much more than worldly success. I saw all these blessings God had given me. The way to give thanks is obedience to God.
3550.author: Hakeem Olajuwon

3551.quote: I'm grateful for my brokenness. I'm grateful for my humility.
3551.author: James McGreevey

3552.quote: As we look forward to freedom, the shining city on the hill and the best days of America lying ahead, it is the men and women in uniform who protect, defend and make us proud to whom we should look and give thanks every night.
3552.author: Robin Hayes

3553.quote: Every day I've got to be thankful that I am alive, and you never know - the cliche is, I guess, you could get hit by a bus tomorrow, so you'd better be at peace with whatever you got going at the moment.
3553.author: Joseph Gordon-Levitt

3554.quote: I give all the glory to God. It's kind of a win-win situation. The glory goes up to Him and the blessings fall down on me.
3554.author: Gabby Douglas

3555.quote: The simple act of saying 'thank you' is a demonstration of gratitude in response to an experience that was meaningful to a customer or citizen.
3555.author: Simon Mainwaring

3556.quote: I'm grateful for always this moment, the now, no matter what form it takes.
3556.author: Eckhart Tolle

3557.quote: Be thankful for problems. If they were less difficult, someone with less ability might have your job.
3557.author: Jim Lovell

3558.quote: Take heed, then, often to come together to give thanks to God, and show forth His praise. For when you assemble frequently in the same place, the powers of Satan are destroyed, and the destruction at which he aims is prevented by the unity of your faith.
3558.author: Ignatius of Antioch

3559.quote: I have a lot to be thankful for. I am healthy, happy and I am loved.
3559.author: Reba McEntire

3560.quote: Drink and be thankful to the host! What seems insignificant when you have it, is important when you need it.
3560.author: Franz Grillparzer

3561.quote: Those men and women are fortunate who are born at a time when a great struggle for human freedom is in progress. It is an added good fortune to have parents who take a personal part in the great movements of their time. I am glad and thankful that this was my case.
3561.author: Emmeline Pankhurst

3562.quote: It makes me feel so amazing to know there's people out here that support me and follow me on Twitter and watch my shows on YouTube and come to my concert, so I'm very thankful.
3562.author: Austin Mahone

3563.quote: I'm not going to tell you to meditate on what Christmas really means and be thankful.
3563.author: Monica Johnson

3564.quote: As a child, I didn't know what I didn't have. I'm thankful for the challenges early on in my life because now I have a perspective on the world and kind of know what's important.
3564.author: America Ferrera

3565.quote: The only jobs kids have are to do well in school, to be charming and polite, and be thankful. That's it. I'll house you, protect you, I'll even give my life for you, and in return, you will behave.
3565.author: Gene Simmons

3566.quote: Strive to find things to be thankful for, and just look for the good in who you are!
3566.author: Bethany Hamilton

3567.quote: In the household in which I was raised, the themes were pretty simple. 'Work hard. Don't quit. Be appreciative, be thankful, be grateful, be respectful. Also, never whine, never complain. And always, for crying out loud, keep a sense of humor.'
3567.author: Michael Keaton

3568.quote: Be thankful we're not getting all the government we're paying for.
3568.author: Will Rogers

3569.quote: I am a big defender of 'Harry Potter,' and I think any book that gets kids to read are books that we should cherish, we should be thankful for them.
3569.author: Judy Blume

3570.quote: We can always find something to be thankful for, and there may be reasons why we ought to be thankful for even those dispensations which appear dark and frowning.
3570.author: Albert Barnes

3571.quote: I had a somewhat religious upbringing. Not strict, but it was there, and I'm kind of thankful for that. If you grow up just watching MTV, that's its own form of religion, and it's not even based on happiness or communal responsibility. I mean, try to construct a worldview out of that.
3571.author: Win Butler

3572.quote: Before I get out of bed, I am saying thank you. I know how important it is to be thankful.
3572.author: Al Jarreau

3573.quote: We in the United States should be all the more thankful for the freedom and religious tolerance we enjoy. And we should always remember the lessons learned from the Holocaust, in hopes we stay vigilant against such inhumanity now and in the future.
3573.author: Charlie Dent

3574.quote: I'm really thankful and complimented when people come to me and say, thank you for the great times for all these years. But I don't think about it as being a leader.
3574.author: Bill Kreutzmann

3575.quote: I had the pleasure, as Robin said, to live a childhood dream as many young Americans and Puerto Rican children live that play youth baseball. And I feel honored and very thankful for that opportunity.
3575.author: Nolan Ryan

3576.quote: I have spent over 60 years bent over a guitar and to know that I wrote 70 compositions that masters have recorded, that makes me feel so good and full, and proud and thankful to the good Lord.
3576.author: Jerry Reed

3577.quote: As the daughter of a 25-year veteran of the armed forces, I am incredibly thankful for the sacrifices our women and men have made in Iraq, and continue to make in Afghanistan.
3577.author: Barbara Lee

3578.quote: Every musician, their goal in life is to play music that people love, and I've accomplished my goal. I was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and left that chapter of my life and those people in the past. Good and bad, I've loved and am thankful for that chapter.
3578.author: Steven Adler

3579.quote: It is okay to be an outsider, a recent arrival, new on the scene - and not just okay, but something to be thankful for... Because being an insider can so easily mean collapsing the horizons, can so easily mean accepting the presumptions of your province.
3579.author: Tan Le

3580.quote: I don't know about changing my perspective, because motherhood is such a glorious blessing and I am very thankful for that. It's such a beautiful experience. I so strongly recommend it. It's bliss, love and fulfillment of another level.
3580.author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan

3581.quote: I'm a human just like anyone else. We all have our problems that we deal with on and off the field. I'm thankful to have a beautiful wife and child that can help ease those problems when you come home.
3581.author: Torrey Smith

3582.quote: I believe that human beings are born first and given passports later. I'm really thankful for my journey. And it's a journey I didn't design.
3582.author: Alfonso Cuaron

3583.quote: When a person doesn't have gratitude, something is missing in his or her humanity.
3583.author: Elie Wiesel

3584.quote: The unthankful heart... discovers no mercies; but let the thankful heart sweep through the day and, as the magnet finds the iron, so it will find, in every hour, some heavenly blessings!
3584.author: Henry Ward Beecher

3585.quote: Gratitude is a duty which ought to be paid, but which none have a right to expect.
3585.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

3586.quote: Years ago, it was pretty hard to get people to empathize even a little bit with scaly, cold-blooded critters; now, thanks a lot to good PR from television, it is easier to get the message of reptile conservation and tolerance across. We have a lot to be thankful to reptiles for, not the least of which is their control of rodents.
3586.author: Romulus Whitaker

3587.quote: My mother is such an incredibly strong woman. She raised a family of five boys extremely well. She made us all strong, loving, caring people. We all support each other. I'm really thankful to her.
3587.author: Henry Cavill

3588.quote: Just don't let the hype of what people are saying and how much they love you, y'know, just take the compliment and be thankful that people are complimenting you, but don't let it consume you; don't let your circumstances around you and the way people view you make you act a certain way.
3588.author: Mary J. Blige

3589.quote: At Thanksgiving, I always start at the top of my list and say I'm grateful for friends, family, and good health. Then I get more superficial... like being thankful for my Louboutins.
3589.author: Christie Brinkley

3590.quote: Let a nation's fervent thanks make some amends for the toils and sufferings of those who survive.
3590.author: Edward Everett

3591.quote: I say grace. I'm a big believer in grace. I happen to believe in a God that made all the food and so I'm pretty grateful for that and I thank him for that. But I'm also thankful for the people that put the food on the table.
3591.author: Alton Brown

3592.quote: We sing a little song before we eat, a little blessing before we eat, and it's really - we're thanking the Lord and the Earth for the food that we eat, and it really brings you together in a profound kind of way.
3592.author: Phil Lesh

3593.quote: I'm thankful for all the things that this job has given me and my family. But probably the thing that I am most proud of throughout my career is that, not only myself, but my family and the people around me have just been regular people, which we are.
3593.author: Brett Favre

3594.quote: What's blessed about my life is that I have been able to connect with the global audience on a regular basis. I am thankful for everybody's love, and I reciprocate that, but I also have to deliver on every occasion.
3594.author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan

3595.quote: I do believe that God blessed me in life with a wonderful family, a successful career, and a loving marriage, and remain thankful for that blessing.
3595.author: Bonnie Tyler

3596.quote: I was in the postseason twice and I'm thankful for that.
3596.author: Ryne Sandberg

3597.quote: Thank God we're living in a country where the sky's the limit, the stores are open late and you can shop in bed thanks to television.
3597.author: Joan Rivers

3598.quote: Does not the gratitude of the dog put to shame any man who is ungrateful to his benefactors?
3598.author: Saint Basil

3599.quote: I'm thankful to my family, friends, and fans for all of their support.
3599.author: Serena Williams

3600.quote: I'm really looking forward to the Hall of Fame ceremonies. It's going to be unbelievable - just crazy. I'm looking forward to thanking all the fans for inspiring me to go out there and play my best football each and every game.
3600.author: Jerry Rice

3601.quote: Every one of our greatest national treasures, our liberty, enterprise, vitality, wealth, military power, global authority, flow from a surprising source: our ability to give thanks.
3601.author: Tony Snow

3602.quote: I realize how unique my path has been. And I'm thankful for that.
3602.author: Vanessa Paradis

3603.quote: I've done it all. I'm thankful and proud of what I've accomplished in my life. I hope to keep doing it.
3603.author: Ralph Stanley

3604.quote: If I could write a story that would do for the Indian one-hundredth part what 'Uncle Tom's Cabin' did for the Negro, I would be thankful the rest of my life.
3604.author: Helen Hunt Jackson

3605.quote: We have to be thankful considering our number as a family we enjoy very good health generally but you may be sure me and my partner have quite enough to exercise our minds and occupy our attention.
3605.author: John Hawley

3606.quote: I am very thankful and blessed to have a healthy and happy baby boy and baby mama.
3606.author: Eric Church

3607.quote: The 'Night Train' has already been a crazy ride for me. We flew around making TV appearances and stadium announcements all over the country, fueled by little more than coffee and adrenaline... so many fans jumped on board with us, and I couldn't be more thankful.
3607.author: Jason Aldean

3608.quote: I'm thankful to have time to write.
3608.author: Paul Watson

3609.quote: There is such a thing as 'thanks-feeling' - feeling thankful. This ought to be the general, universal spirit of the Christian.
3609.author: Charles Spurgeon

3610.quote: I'm just really, really thankful. I'm thankful to the doctors; I'm thankful to the family that donated the kidney.
3610.author: Natalie Cole

3611.quote: I'm happy with who I am inside. I'd hate to have accolades and all that and not really be happy with who I was. So I'm really thankful for my family and for the support system that I have for being the person that I am today. I'm proud of who I am.
3611.author: Keke Palmer

3612.quote: Thanks to the Interstate Highway System, it is now possible to travel across the country from coast to coast without seeing anything.
3612.author: Charles Kuralt

3613.quote: We can be thankful to a friend for a few acres, or a little money; and yet for the freedom and command of the whole earth, and for the great benefits of our being, our life, health, and reason, we look upon ourselves as under no obligation.
3613.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

3614.quote: From too much love of living, From hope and fear set free, We thank with brief thanksgiving Whatever gods may be That no life lives for ever; That dead men rise up never; That even the weariest river Winds somewhere safe to sea.
3614.author: Algernon Charles Swinburne

3615.quote: Sometimes we need to remind ourselves that thankfulness is indeed a virtue.
3615.author: William Bennett

3616.quote: Well, there's not a day goes by when I don't get up and say thank you to somebody.
3616.author: Rod Stewart

3617.quote: By and large, the gospel of grace is neither proclaimed, understood, nor lived.
3617.author: Brennan Manning

3618.quote: A federal judge did as he was supposed to do and upheld the Constitution. We should be thankful that we have judiciary that will do that.
3618.author: Michael Newdow

3619.quote: Well, my first languages are German and Spanish because I was brought up by a Spanish mother and a German father, so I always spoke both languages at home. I'm very thankful that I was brought up in a bilingual house.
3619.author: Daniel Bruhl

3620.quote: Charity never humiliated him who profited from it, nor ever bound him by the chains of gratitude, since it was not to him but to God that the gift was made.
3620.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

3621.quote: I would maintain that thanks are the highest form of thought, and that gratitude is happiness doubled by wonder.
3621.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

3622.quote: A single grateful thought toward heaven is the most perfect prayer.
3622.author: Gotthold Ephraim Lessing

3623.quote: A proud man is seldom a grateful man, for he never thinks he gets as much as he deserves.
3623.author: Henry Ward Beecher

3624.quote: Most people repent their sins by thanking God they ain't so wicked as their neighbors.
3624.author: Josh Billings

3626.quote: Thankfully, dreams can change. If we'd all stuck with our first dream, the world would be overrun with cowboys and princesses.
3626.author: Stephen Colbert

3627.quote: I'm thankful for the ability to share my faith in a lot of different places. It's something that I take as a responsibility and an obligation to handle as best as I can.
3627.author: Tim Tebow

3628.quote: I am what I am thanks to my mother, my father, my brother, my sister... because they have given me everything. The education I have is thanks to them.
3628.author: Ronaldinho

3629.quote: The brave who focus on all things good and all things beautiful and all things true, even in the small, who give thanks for it and discover joy even in the here and now, they are the change agents who bring fullest Light to all the world.
3629.author: Ann Voskamp

3630.quote: The children have been a wonderful gift to me, and I'm thankful to have once again seen our world through their eyes. They restore my faith in the family's future.
3630.author: Jackie Kennedy

3631.quote: I'm so thankful for my family and friends - they're really supportive. Everyone I work with on 'Austin & Ally;' the cast and crew are like my family now. We have so much fun, and I'm so happy they're in my life!
3631.author: Laura Marano

3632.quote: I'm from Canada, so Thanksgiving to me is just Thursday with more food. And I'm thankful for that.
3632.author: Howie Mandel

3633.quote: As with all commandments, gratitude is a description of a successful mode of living. The thankful heart opens our eyes to a multitude of blessings that continually surround us.
3633.author: James E. Faust

3634.quote: The worst moment for the atheist is when he is really thankful and has nobody to thank.
3634.author: Dante Gabriel Rossetti

3635.quote: I am thankful for all the blessings and talents I have been given, but most of all I am thankful for my loving and supportive family.
3635.author: Olivia Holt

3636.quote: There is a lot to celebrate about that little Babe who was laid in a manger. Christians celebrate Christmas because they are thankful for the promise of salvation, which was delivered in human flesh and named Jesus.
3636.author: Monica Johnson

3637.quote: He enjoys much who is thankful for little.
3637.author: Thomas Secker

3638.quote: I'm just so lucky - my office is a racetrack. That is something I'm very thankful for. It's exciting, and it's challenging, and there are a lot of emotions and nerves that come with it, but right there before the gates open, before that minute and a half or two minutes of the race, it just hits you.
3638.author: Chantal Sutherland

3639.quote: My first languages are German and Spanish because I was brought up by a Spanish mother and a German father, so I always spoke both languages at home. I'm very thankful that I was brought up in a bilingual house.
3639.author: Daniel Bruhl

3640.quote: We are in a wrong state of mind if we are not in a thankful state of mind.
3640.author: Charles Spurgeon
